description: This file defines a React functional component named 'LibraryItem' which presents a preview card with an optional toggle to view code. It includes imports for React, useState, and a 'CodeViewer' component. The component displays a header with title and category, a toggle button, and conditionally shows a preview and code viewer.

methods.name: LibraryItem({ title, category, Preview, code })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a card with a title, category badge, preview component, and optional code viewer toggle.

ctags.name: LibraryItem
ctags.pattern: /^export default function LibraryItem({ title, category, Preview, code }) {$/
